com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.gridfs

Interface AsyncOutputStream

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    GridFSUploadStream

    public interface AsyncOutputStream
    The Async Output Stream interface represents some asynchronous output stream of bytes.

    See the com.mongodb.async.client.gridfs.helpers package for adapters that create an AsyncOutputStream

    Since:
    1.3

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.reactivestreams.Publisher<Success> close()
      Closes the output stream
      org.reactivestreams.Publisher<Integer> write(ByteBuffer src)
      Writes a sequence of bytes from the given buffer into this stream.

    • Method Detail

      • write

        org.reactivestreams.Publisher<Integer> write(ByteBuffer src)
        Writes a sequence of bytes from the given buffer into this stream.
        Parameters:
        src - the source buffer containing the data to be written.
        Returns:
        a publisher with a single element, the number of bytes written.

      • close

        org.reactivestreams.Publisher<Success> close()
        Closes the output stream
        Returns:
        a publisher with a single element indicating when the stream has been closed
